frontmatter.title: Buzzapp
frontmatter.meta_title: ReactXS - UIKit for Material Design 2.0 by React Native
frontmatter.meta_description: React Native currently creates vibrant wave in mobile application development. “Write once, Run anywhere”, then you can effectively produce mobile app across all platforms including iOS & Android by one language with “Native effect”.

markdownRemark.html:
Buzzapp is an app that does magic for your website by converting your Wordpress website into mobile true native app with customized contents within a fillip.

What is “customized content”? Buzzapp transfers exactly all contents with different formats that you created in Wordpress website into your mobile app without any coding skill and development time. To engage with customers in mobile, we need mobile app. Buzzapp maximizes your customers experience and usability through UX flow in both Android and iOs.

What will you get?

  • Full source code React Native package, easy to customize.
  • Full integrate with your Wordpress site via Rest API
  • No dependency to your existing website templates.
  • Easy to installing and delivery your own app.
  • Saving your plus 1000 hours of development and a great boilerplate to kickoff your project
  • Build your standalone app and delivery to both Appstore & Google Play
  • Run with Expo tools (http://expo.io) which is easy to setup
  • Run smoothly and already well testing on both of iOS & Android from the QA team.
  • Get free regular version update & coming new features.
  • High coding quality from the Elite Author of Envato (https://codecanyon.net/user/inspireui)
  • 100% refund if you are not happy with the products.

Reference

  • iOS demo: https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/cefoods/id1435064112?mt=8
  • Android demo: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.inspireui.cefoods
  • BuzzApp (2nd theme): Expo app, website
    (Integrate with the Bimber template, not include with the package)
  • Company website: https://inspireui.com/product/Buzzapp
  • Support: https://github.com/inspireui/support/issues
